sentences.chinese: 一辆车在旁边停了下来。

sentences.chinese: 过了这么多年，她的容貌并没有多大改变。

sentences.chinese: 一个彻底消亡的古老习俗

sentences.chinese: 国会可以完全禁止这次游行。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something has been done completely or has finished completely

sentences.chinese: 有天赋的业余爱好者

sentences.chinese: 米克尔森还是业余选手时就赢得了他第一个高尔夫球锦标赛大奖。

sentences.english: He’s an amazing player to watch.
sentences.chinese: 看他比赛那才叫精彩呢。

sentences.chinese: 美国驻西班牙大使

sentences.english: He was young and full of ambition.
sentences.chinese: 他年轻，而且雄心勃勃。

sentences.chinese: 宪法修正案

sentences.chinese: 在一片美国经济疲软的传言中，美元贬值了。

sentences.chinese: 示威者在“处死暴君！”的叫喊声中将国旗撕得粉碎。

sentences.chinese: 她接受精神分析治疗已经三年了。

sentences.chinese: 亚洲的古代文明

sentences.chinese: 有城墙的古城

sentences.chinese: 民众对政府越来越不满。

sentences.chinese: 你没有量准角度。

sentences.chinese: 我很生气，因为他没有告诉我他的计划。

sentences.chinese: 他的话激起反对派政客愤怒的回应。

sentences.english: Jack and Kim celebrated their twentieth wedding anniversary in January.
sentences.chinese: 1月，杰克和金庆祝了他们的结婚20周年纪念日。

sentences.english: The minister made the announcement at a news conference.
sentences.chinese: 部长在记者招待会上发表了这项声明。

sentences.english: an antique rosewood desk
sentences.chinese: 古董红木书桌

detailed_translations.english: antique furniture, jewellery etc is old and often valuable

detailed_translations.chinese: 古董，古玩；古风，古希腊和古罗马艺术风格
detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture, jewellery etc that was made a very long time ago and is therefore valuable

sentences.chinese: 他焦虑的心情

sentences.chinese: 工厂安装了摄像头，这引起了工人的高度不安。

sentences.chinese: 政治上中间偏右的联合政府

sentences.english: an emergency meeting of the three coalition parties
sentences.chinese: 三个联盟政党召开的一次紧急会议

detailed_translations.chinese: 结合体， 同盟； 结合， 联合
detailed_translations.english: a union of two or more political parties that allows them to form a government or fight an election together

sentences.english: Billy! Put your coat on , it’s cold outside!
sentences.chinese: 比利！穿上外套，外面很冷！

sentences.english: The kids took off their coats and threw them on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们脱下外套扔在地板上。

sentences.english: I need a new winter coat .
sentences.chinese: 我需要一件新的冬衣。

sentences.english: The lab assistants wear long white coats.
sentences.chinese: 实验室助手穿着白色的长外套。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing with long sleeves that is worn over your clothes to protect them or to keep you warm
to cover something with a thin layer of something else

sentences.english: The spy sent his message in code.
sentences.chinese: 这个间谍用密码发送情报。

sentences.english: But we have not yet implemented this in the code.
sentences.chinese: 但我们在代码中尚未实现此功能。

sentences.english: The hacker came smack up against the company's policy of keeping its records in code.
sentences.chinese: 这个计算机黑客突然碰壁了，因这家公司实行了用密码保存公司纪录的政策。

sentences.english: Do you want a cup of coffee?
sentences.chinese: 你要来杯咖啡吗？

sentences.english: Do you like your coffee white (= with milk ) or black (= without milk ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你的咖啡要加奶还是不加奶？

detailed_translations.english: a hot dark brown drink that has a slightly bitter taste

sentences.english: a collective decision made by all board members
sentences.chinese: 董事会所有成员作出的集体决定

sentences.english: our collective responsibility for the environment
sentences.chinese: 我们对环境的共同责任

detailed_translations.english: shared or made by every member of a group or society

sentences.english: Nothing remained of the colonel.
sentences.chinese: 上校身后毫无遗物。

sentences.english: The captain jumped several grades and now was a colonel.
sentences.chinese: 这名上尉一连跳过了好几级，现在是上校了。

sentences.english: What if they go on to behave as murderously as the colonel and his paid killers?
sentences.chinese: 如果他们像他们的是上校和他的杀手们一样继续表现为杀气腾腾的又该怎么办？

detailed_translations.english: a high rank in the army, Marines, or the US air force, or someone who has this rank

sentences.english: He writes a weekly column for ‘The Times’.
sentences.chinese: 他每周为《泰晤士报》写一篇专栏文章。

detailed_translations.english: an article on a particular subject or by a particular writer that appears regularly in a newspaper or magazine

sentences.english: In the case of this battle, the combat did only last a singleday.
sentences.chinese: 在译成战役的情况下，这场战斗仅仅持续了短短的一天。

sentences.english: We will remove our combat brigades from Iraq by the end of next summer, and all of our troops by the end of 2011.
sentences.chinese: 我们会在明年夏末从伊拉克撤回我们的战斗旅，在2011年末，我们所有军队都将从伊拉克撤出。

sentences.english: These people would then be given training in vigilance and combat not just to defend themselves but also the borders.
sentences.chinese: 这些人会被提供警戒和战斗训练，不仅是为了保护自己，而且要保护边界安全。

detailed_translations.english: fighting, especially during a war

sentences.english: a combination nightclub and café
sentences.chinese: 夜总会兼咖啡馆

detailed_translations.english: two or more different things that exist together or are used or put together

sentences.english: Diets are most effective when combined with exercise.
sentences.chinese: 节食和锻炼相结合是最有效的。

sentences.english: Ruth hesitated, uncertain of how to combine honesty and diplomacy in her answer.
sentences.chinese: 露丝犹豫了，她不知道怎样回答才能既诚实又婉转。

detailed_translations.english: if you combine two or more different things, or if they combine, they begin to exist or work together

detailed_translations.chinese: 联合企业； 联合收割机
detailed_translations.english: a machine used by farmers to cut grain, separate the seeds from it, and clean it

sentences.english: a career in stand-up comedy
sentences.chinese: 单口喜剧表演职业

detailed_translations.english: entertainment that is intended to make people laugh

sentences.english: I dress for comfort, not fashion.
sentences.chinese: 我穿衣服只讲舒服，不追求时髦。

sentences.english: Alan was very reluctant to leave the warmth and comfort of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 艾伦很不情愿离开暖和舒适的火堆。

sentences.english: Now you can watch your favorite movies in the comfort of your own home.
sentences.chinese: 现在你可以舒舒服服地在自己家里看你最喜欢的电影了。

sentences.english: Whenever he was upset, he would turn to her for comfort and advice.
sentences.chinese: 他每当心烦意乱时，就会去向她寻求安慰和建议。

sentences.english: He longed to take her in his arms and comfort her.
sentences.chinese: 他很想把她搂在怀里安慰她。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being physically relaxed and satisfied, so that nothing is hurting you, making you feel too hot or cold etc
to make someone feel less worried, unhappy, or upset, for example by saying kind things to them or touching them

sentences.english: The bed wasn’t particularly comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 这床不大舒服。

detailed_translations.english: making you feel physically relaxed, without any pain or without being too hot, cold etc

sentences.english: He commanded his men to retreat.
sentences.chinese: 他命令手下撤退。

sentences.english: He commands the 4th Battalion.
sentences.chinese: 他指挥第四营。

sentences.english: the power and finances commanded by the police
sentences.chinese: 警方掌握的权力和资金

detailed_translations.english: (of sb in a position of authority) to tell sb to do sth

sentences.english: the American Commander, General Otis
sentences.chinese: 美军指挥官奥蒂斯将军

sentences.english: our platoon commander
sentences.chinese: 我们的排长

detailed_translations.english: an officer of any rank who is in charge of a group of soldiers or a particular military activity

name: commentator
trans: n. 注解者；时事评论家;实况报导者

sentences.english: political commentators
sentences.chinese: 政治评论员

detailed_translations.chinese: 评论员，解说员；实况播音员；时事评论者
detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, and who writes about it or discusses it on the television or radio

sentences.english: measures promoting local commerce and industry
sentences.chinese: 促进地方工商业发展的措施

detailed_translations.english: the buying and selling of goods and services

name: commissioner
trans: n.专员，委员，政府特派员；地方长官，官员

sentences.english: ...Alaska's commissioner of education.
sentences.chinese: …阿拉斯加州的教育要员。

detailed_translations.chinese: 理事；委员；行政长官；总裁
detailed_translations.english: someone who is officially in charge of a government department in some countries

sentences.english: We communicated mostly by e-mail.
sentences.chinese: 我们主要是用电子邮件沟通。

sentences.english: A baby communicates its needs by crying.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿用哭来表达需要。

detailed_translations.english: to exchange information or conversation with other people, using words, signs, writing etc

sentences.english: Radio was the pilot’s only means of communication.
sentences.chinese: 无线电是飞行员唯一的通信手段。

sentences.english: There has been a breakdown in communication (= failure to communicate ) .
sentences.chinese: 沟通失败。

sentences.english: Paris has good communications with many European cities.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎与许多欧洲城市之间交通便捷。

detailed_translations.english: the process by which people exchange information or express their thoughts and feelings

sentences.english: The report compares the different types of home computer available.
sentences.chinese: 这份报告比较了市场上不同类型的家用计算机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比较， 对照； 把…比作
detailed_translations.english: to consider two or more things or people, in order to show how they are similar or different

sentences.english: Her paintings invite comparison with those of the early Impressionists (= they remind you of them ) .
sentences.chinese: 她的画作让人想起早期的印象派作品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比较， 对照； 比拟， 比喻
detailed_translations.english: the process of comparing two or more people or things

sentences.english: People who are wrongly arrested may be paid compensation .
sentences.chinese: 被误抓的人有可能得到补偿费。

detailed_translations.english: money paid to someone because they have suffered injury or loss, or because something they own has been damaged

sentences.english: The banks have long competed with American Express's charge cards and various shop cards.
sentences.chinese: 这些银行长期以来一直与美国运通公司的记账卡和各种商店卡竞争。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比赛， 竞争， 对抗
detailed_translations.english: if one company or country competes with another, it tries to get people to buy its goods or servicesrather than those available from another company or country

sentences.english: Competitive sports encourage children to work together as a team.
sentences.chinese: 竞技体育鼓励孩子们进行团队协作。

sentences.english: Advertising is an intensely competitive business.
sentences.chinese: 广告业是一个竞争激烈的行业。

detailed_translations.english: relating to competition

sentences.english: Last year they sold twice as many computers as their competitors.
sentences.chinese: 去年他们的计算机销量是竞争对手的两倍。

detailed_translations.english: a person, team, company etc that is competing with another

sentences.english: If you wish to make a complaint, you should see the manager.
sentences.chinese: 如果你要投诉，应该去找经理。

sentences.english: The sales assistants are trained to deal with customer complaints in a friendly manner.
sentences.chinese: 售货员都受过培训，要以友好的态度处理顾客的投诉。

detailed_translations.english: a statement in which someone complains about something

sentences.english: a complicated pattern
sentences.chinese: 复杂的图案

sentences.english: The human brain is an incredibly complicated organ.
sentences.chinese: 人脑是一个结构极其复杂的器官。

detailed_translations.english: consisting of many closely connected parts

sentences.english: Gorbachev failed to keep the component parts of the Soviet Union together.
sentences.chinese: 戈尔巴乔夫没能使苏联各组成部分保持在一起。

detailed_translations.english: the component parts of something are the parts that it consists of
one of several parts that together make up a whole machine, system etc

sentences.english: Barrington has composed the music for a new production of ‘A Midsummer Night’s Dream’.
sentences.chinese: 巴林顿为新版的《仲夏夜之梦》谱了曲。

sentences.english: Water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 水由氢和氧组成。

detailed_translations.english: to write a piece of music

sentences.english: We offer our customers a comprehensive range of financial products.
sentences.chinese: 我们为客户提供全面的金融产品。

sentences.english: a comprehensive guide to British hotels and restaurants
sentences.chinese: 一本介绍英国酒店和餐厅的详尽指南

sentences.english: The following guidelines do not aim to be totally comprehensive.
sentences.chinese: 以下指导原则并非想要面面俱到。

detailed_translations.english: including all the necessary facts, details, or problems that need to be dealt with

sentences.english: She admitted that she was unable to compromise.
sentences.chinese: 她承认自己无法作出妥协。

detailed_translations.chinese: 妥协； 危及； 放弃
detailed_translations.english: to reach an agreement in which everyone involved accepts less than what they wanted at first
an agreement that is achieved after everyone involved accepts less than what they wanted at first, or the act of making this agreement

sentences.english: ‘That’s the only possible solution.’ ‘Yes, I suppose so,’ Charles conceded.
sentences.chinese: “那是唯一可行的解决办法。”“对，我想是。”查尔斯承认道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 承认， 承认…为真； 承认失败； 允许， 让予； 让步， 认输
detailed_translations.english: to admit that something is true or correct, although you wish it were not true

sentences.english: Now please concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 现在请集中注意力。

sentences.english: Adrian was finding it difficult to concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 阿德里安觉得自己很难集中注意力。

sentences.english: Italian industry is concentrated mainly in the north.
sentences.chinese: 意大利的工业主要集中在北部。

sentences.english: orange juice made from concentrate
sentences.chinese: 用浓缩橙汁冲兑的橙汁

detailed_translations.english: to think very carefully about something that you are doing

sentences.english: She needed all her powers of concentration to stop herself from slipping on the icy road.
sentences.chinese: 她需要集中全部注意力才能不让自己在结冰的路上滑倒。

sentences.english: Lack of concentration was a real problem.
sentences.chinese: 注意力不集中是个大问题。

sentences.english: I lost my concentration and fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 我精神一放松就睡着了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 集中； 专注， 专心； 浓缩； 浓度
detailed_translations.english: the ability to think about something carefully or for a long time

sentences.english: a new concept in business travel
sentences.chinese: 商务旅行的新理念

sentences.english: our basic concepts of decent human behaviour
sentences.chinese: 我们对得体的人类行为的基本观念

sentences.english: It’s very simple, once you grasp the concept .
sentences.chinese: 你一旦掌握了这个概念之后就很简单了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 概念， 观念； 设想
detailed_translations.english: an idea of how something is, or how something should be done

sentences.english: Divorce is very painful, especially when children are concerned.
sentences.chinese: 离婚是非常痛苦的，涉及孩子的话更是如此。

sentences.english: Some of the farmers concerned suffer particularly from the low prices.
sentences.chinese: 涉及的农民当中，有些人因低价受到的损失尤为惨重。

sentences.english: We are trying to reach an agreement with all concerned (= everyone who is involved or affected ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们试图与相关各方达成协议。

detailed_translations.english: involved in something or affected by it

detailed_translations.chinese: 关心（concern的过去时和过去分词）；与…有关

sentences.english: a rock concert
sentences.chinese: 摇滚音乐会

sentences.english: a concert of French choral music
sentences.chinese: 法国合唱音乐会

sentences.english: We were going to a concert in Bath Abbey.
sentences.chinese: 我们要去听一场在巴斯修道院内举行的音乐会。

sentences.english: She still does about 100 concerts every year.
sentences.chinese: 她每年仍然举行100场左右的演唱会。

detailed_translations.english: a performance given by musicians or singers

detailed_translations.chinese: 音乐会用的；在音乐会上演出的

sentences.english: The British were not prepared to make any concessions .
sentences.chinese: 英国人没有打算作出让步。

sentences.english: the import/export concessions that had been granted to the island
sentences.chinese: 同意给该岛的进出口特许权

detailed_translations.english: something that you allow someone to have in order to end an argument or a disagreement

sentences.english: When the investigation is concluded, the results will be sent to the US Attorney’s office.
sentences.chinese: 等到调查结束后，结果会被送到联邦检察官办公室。

sentences.english: Francis, having concluded his business with James, left for Miami.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯完成了和詹姆斯的买卖后就去了迈阿密。

detailed_translations.english: to complete something you have been doing, especially for a long time

detailed_translations.chinese: 推断出，推论出；缔结，议定
detailed_translations.english: to decide that something is true after considering all the information you have

sentences.english: These are the report’s main conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 这些就是这篇报告的主要结论。

sentences.english: It is still too early to reach a conclusion on this point.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上作出结论还为时过早。

sentences.english: There are perhaps two main conclusions to be drawn from the above discussion.
sentences.chinese: 从以上的讨论也许可以得出两个主要的结论。

sentences.english: All the evidence pointed to the conclusion that he was guilty.
sentences.chinese: 所有证据都表明他是有罪的。

sentences.english: It’s important not to jump to conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 决不要贸然下结论。

sentences.english: The police came to the inescapable conclusion that the children had been murdered.
sentences.chinese: 警方得出了无法回避的结论: 这些儿童被谋杀了。

sentences.english: At the conclusion of the meeting, little progress had been made.
sentences.chinese: 会议开到最后，没有取得多少进展。

detailed_translations.english: something you decide after considering all the information you have

sentences.english: What does that mean in concrete terms ?
sentences.chinese: 具体来说那到底是什么意思？

sentences.english: the lack of any concrete evidence
sentences.chinese: 缺少具体证据的

sentences.english: a dialogue about concrete issues and problems
sentences.chinese: 有关具体事情和问题的对话

detailed_translations.english: definite and specific

sentences.english: Politicians were quick to condemn the bombing.
sentences.chinese: 政治家们立即对爆炸事件进行了谴责。

sentences.english: He was found guilty and condemned to death.
sentences.chinese: 他被裁定有罪，判了死刑。

detailed_translations.english: to say very strongly that you do not approve of something or someone, especially because you think it is morally wrong

sentences.english: Despite her disability, Philippa is very confident.
sentences.chinese: 菲莉帕虽然有残疾，却很自信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 确信的， 肯定的； 自信的
detailed_translations.english: sure that something will happen in the way that you want or expect

sentences.english: The problems confronting the new government were enormous.
sentences.chinese: 新政府面临的难题是巨大的。

sentences.english: I confronted him with my suspicions, and he admitted everything.
sentences.chinese: 我当面向他提出我的怀疑，他什么都承认了。

detailed_translations.english: (of problems or a difficult situation) to appear and need to be dealt with by sb

sentences.english: She had stayed in her room to avoid another confrontation.
sentences.chinese: 她待在自己的房间里，以避免再次发生冲突。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which there is a lot of angry disagreement between two people or groups

sentences.english: The president explained his plans to congressional leaders.
sentences.chinese: 总统向国会领导人说明了他的计划。

detailed_translations.english: A congressional policy, action, or person relates to the U.S. Congress.

sentences.english: Police have so far failed to establish a connection between the two murders.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止警方尚未确定两宗凶杀案之间有关联。

sentences.english: The evidence was there in the file but no one made the connection .
sentences.chinese: 证据就在档案里，但没有人把它们联系起来。

sentences.english: Students often see little connection between school and the rest of their lives.
sentences.chinese: 学生往往看不到上学和今后生活的联系。

sentences.english: He demonstrated the close connection between social conditions and health.
sentences.chinese: 他证明了社会条件和健康之间的密切联系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 连接； 联系； 连接物， 连接点； 亲戚
detailed_translations.english: the way in which two facts, ideas, events etc are related to each other, and one is affected or caused by the other

sentences.english: I became conscious of someone watching me.
sentences.chinese: 我察觉到有人在监视我。

sentences.english: a conscious act of cruelty
sentences.chinese: 有意而为的残暴行径

detailed_translations.english: noticing or realizing something

sentences.english: The painful memories eventually faded from her consciousness.
sentences.chinese: 那些痛苦的回忆最终从她的意识中淡去了。

sentences.english: Hypnosis is an altered state of consciousness .
sentences.chinese: 催眠状态是一种被改变的意识状态。

sentences.english: research into human consciousness
sentences.chinese: 对人类意识的研究

detailed_translations.english: your mind and your thoughts

sentences.english: Her lawyer said she understood the consequences of her actions and was prepared to go to jail.
sentences.chinese: 她的律师说她明白自己行为的后果并准备去坐牢。

detailed_translations.english: something that happens as a result of a particular action or set of conditions

sentences.english: Considering the strength of the opposition, we did very well to score two goals.
sentences.chinese: 考虑到对方实力强大，我们能攻进两球已经很不错了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鉴于， 考虑到， 顾及
detailed_translations.english: used to say that you are thinking about a particular fact when you are giving your opinion

sentences.english: My diet consisted almost exclusively of chocolate-covered cookies and glasses of milk.
sentences.chinese: 我的饮食几乎只包含裹上巧克力的曲奇饼和一杯杯牛奶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 由…组成； 在于； 一致

sentences.english: We need to be consistent in our approach.
sentences.chinese: 我们在方法上要前后一致。

detailed_translations.english: always behaving in the same way or having the same attitudes, standards etc – usually used to show approval

sentences.english: The right to speak freely is written into the Constitution of the United States.
sentences.chinese: 言论自由的权利被写入美国宪法。

sentences.english: She’s got a strong constitution – she’ll recover in no time.
sentences.chinese: 她体质强壮，很快就会恢复。

sentences.english: What’s the chemical constitution of the dye?
sentences.chinese: 这种染料的化学成分是什么？

detailed_translations.english: a set of basic laws and principles that a country or organization is governed by

sentences.english: There are plans to construct a new road bridge across the river.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要建造一条新的跨河公路桥。

detailed_translations.english: to build something such as a house, bridge, road etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 建筑物； 构想； 观念
detailed_translations.english: an idea formed by combining several pieces of information or knowledge

sentences.english: a road construction project
sentences.chinese: 道路修建计划

sentences.english: construction workers
sentences.chinese: 建筑工人

detailed_translations.english: the process of building things such as houses, bridges, roads etc

sentences.english: If symptoms persist, consult a doctor without delay.
sentences.chinese: 如果症状持续的话，马上咨询医生。

sentences.english: Have you consulted a dictionary?
sentences.chinese: 你查过词典了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to ask for information or advice from someone because it is their job to know something

sentences.english: a management consultant

sentences.chinese: 她想保护她的孩子不受外界的不良影响。

sentences.chinese: 天气一直寒冷，但今天是个例外。

sentences.english: ‘Julia and Paul are getting married!’ ‘Oh, how exciting!’

sentences.chinese: 我给你带来了一些很激动人心的消息。

sentences.english: Let’s do something exciting.
sentences.chinese: 我们来做些让人振奋的事情吧。

sentences.english: Melanie finds her work exciting and rewarding.
sentences.chinese: 梅拉妮觉得自己的工作既刺激又有意义。

detailed_translations.english: making you feel excited

sentences.chinese: 这次我原谅你，但别再迟到了。

sentences.chinese: 请原谅，我的字写得不好。

sentences.english: Can I be excused from swimming today? I have a cold.
sentences.chinese: 我今天能不游泳吗？我感冒了。

a reason that you invent to explain an action and to hide your real intentions

sentences.english: 13 people were summarily executed (= killed without any trial or legal process ) by the guerrillas.
sentences.chinese: 有13人被游击队员就地处决。

sentences.english: The job involves drawing up and executing a plan of nursing care.
sentences.chinese: 这项工作包括拟订和实施一个护理计划。

detailed_translations.english: to kill someone, especially legally as a punishment

sentences.english: A full day’s teaching exhausts me.
sentences.chinese: 讲一整天课令我精疲力竭。

sentences.english: We are in danger of exhausting the world’s oil supply.
sentences.chinese: 我们面临世界石油储备耗尽的危险。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel extremely tired

sentences.english: All visitors to the exhibition must report to the main service desk.
sentences.chinese: 到展览会参观的人都必须先到总服务台报到。

sentences.english: Our country will tie up with another country to host this exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 我国将和另外一个国家联合主办这次展览会。

sentences.english: You go to the exhibition centre, I must hie myself to tell the new matters.
sentences.chinese: 你去展览中心吧，我得赶紧汇报一下这个新情况。

detailed_translations.english: a show of paintings, photographs, or other objects that people can go to see

sentences.english: the exiled former president
sentences.chinese: 流亡国外的前总统

sentences.english: political exiles
sentences.chinese: 政治流亡者

detailed_translations.english: to force someone to leave their country, especially for political reasons
a person who is forced to live away from his or her own country

sentences.english: Water expands as it freezes.
sentences.chinese: 水结冰时会膨胀。

sentences.english: Sydney’s population expanded rapidly in the 1960s.
sentences.chinese: 20世纪60年代，悉尼的人口迅速增加。

sentences.english: exercises that expand the chest muscles
sentences.chinese: 扩展胸肌的运动

sentences.english: his expanding waistline
sentences.chinese: 他那逐渐增大的腰围

detailed_translations.english: to become larger in size, number, or amount, or to make something become larger

sentences.english: Having raised expectations (= made people more hopeful ), he went on to help only a few people.
sentences.chinese: 他唤起了大家的希望，但接着只是帮助了几个人。

sentences.english: The show exceeded all expectations (= was much better than expected ).
sentences.chinese: 这场演出比人们预期的要好得多。

sentences.english: The number of people who attended fell short of expectations (= was lower than expected ).
sentences.chinese: 出席的人数比预期的要少。

detailed_translations.english: what you think or hope will happen

sentences.english: He borrowed £150,000 and used the money for legal expenses.
sentences.chinese: 他借了15万英镑用于支付律师费。

sentences.english: Conference rooms were equipped at great expense.
sentences.chinese: 装备会议室花费巨大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 花费， 消费， 费用； 开支， 业务费用
detailed_translations.english: the amount of money that you spend on something

sentences.english: The teacher provided some different materials and left the children to experiment.
sentences.chinese: 老师提供了几种不同的材料让孩子们试验。

detailed_translations.english: to try using various ideas, methods etc to find out how good or effective they are
a scientific test done to find out how something reacts under certain conditions, or to find out if a particular idea is true

sentences.english: She told the court she would give a full explanation of the prosecution's decision on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 她告诉法庭她将在星期一就控方的决定做出详尽的解释。

sentences.english: The device was thrown at an army patrol but failed to explode.
sentences.chinese: 炸弹投向了陆军巡逻队，但没有爆炸。

sentences.english: Far sooner than anyone thought possible, the Russians exploded an atomic bomb.
sentences.chinese: 苏联引爆了一颗原子弹，大大早于任何人的预期。

detailed_translations.english: to burst, or to make something burst, into small pieces, usually with a loud noise and in a way that causes damage
to burst, or to make something burst, into small pieces, usually with a loud noise and in a way that causes damage

sentences.english: the urgent need to exploit the resources of the Irish Sea
sentences.chinese: 开发爱尔兰海资源的迫切需要

detailed_translations.english: to develop and use minerals, forests, oil etc for business or industry

sentences.english: Management need to explore ways of improving office security.
sentences.chinese: 管理层需要探讨如何加强办事处的安全措施。

sentences.english: I’m going to explore the possibility of a part-time job.
sentences.chinese: 我要好好想想兼职工作的可能性。

detailed_translations.english: to discuss or think about something carefully

sentences.english: We heard a loud explosion.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到一声巨大的爆炸声。

sentences.english: It was an explosion of anger against the practices of the occupying forces.
sentences.chinese: 这是人们不满占领军行为而爆发的怒火。

detailed_translations.english: the act of deliberately causing sth to explode

sentences.english: He lifted his T-shirt to expose a jagged scar across his chest.
sentences.chinese: 他撩起T恤衫，露出横贯胸部的锯齿状伤疤。

detailed_translations.english: to show something that is usually covered or hidden

sentences.english: Prolonged exposure to the sun can cause skin cancer.
sentences.chinese: 长时间晒太阳会导致皮肤癌。

sentences.english: the exposure of his underground political activity

sentences.english: The failure of their marriage has got a lot of exposure recently.

sentences.english: Student leaders are demanding greater freedom of expression (= the right to say what you think without being punished ).
sentences.chinese: 学生领袖要求得到更多的言论自由。

detailed_translations.chinese: 词语； 表达， 表情
detailed_translations.english: something you say, write, or do that shows what you think or feel

sentences.english: The house stands in extensive grounds.
sentences.chinese: 这栋房子占地面积很大。

sentences.english: Fire has caused extensive damage to the island’s forests.
sentences.chinese: 大火严重毁坏了岛上的森林。

sentences.english: the extensive use of pesticides
sentences.chinese: 杀虫剂的大量使用

sentences.chinese: 这次展览会被全国媒体广泛报道。

sentences.chinese: 事情还没有发展到那种程度。

sentences.english: When the smoke blew away, we could see the extent of the damage.
sentences.chinese: 浓烟消散后， 我们就能看清破坏的程度了。

sentences.chinese: 人类的合作程度，而非合作本身，是独一无二的。

sentences.chinese: 这费了相当多的功夫。

sentences.chinese: 真想不到他又犯了完全相同的错误。

sentences.chinese: 美国已要求召开一次联合国人权委员特别紧急会议来调查这次危机。

detailed_translations.english: very unusual or surprising

sentences.chinese: 许多农村地区仍处于赤贫状态。

sentences.english: extreme cold

sentences.chinese: 他费了极大的劲找配料。

detailed_translations.english: very great in degree

sentences.english: our new range of fabrics and wallpapers
sentences.chinese: 我们新的织物和墙纸系列

sentences.english: The country’s social fabric is disintegrating.
sentences.chinese: 该国的社会结构正在瓦解。

detailed_translations.english: cloth used for making clothes, curtains etc

sentences.chinese: 党内的派系斗争

sentences.english: the leaders of the warring factions

sentences.chinese: 渐暗的暮色

sentences.chinese: 一条褪了色的牛仔裤

sentences.chinese: 太阳把窗帘晒得褪了色。

detailed_translations.english: to lose colour and brightness, or to make something do this

sentences.chinese: 那幢房子有个不小的花园。

sentences.chinese: 她英语讲得还不错。

sentences.english: I felt I hadn’t been treated fairly.
sentences.chinese: 我感到自己没有受到公正对待。

detailed_translations.english: more than a little, but much less than very

sentences.chinese: 人们已失去了对政府的信心。

sentences.english: deep religious faith
sentences.chinese: 坚定的宗教信仰

sentences.chinese: 我不想让你有任何虚假的希望。

sentences.chinese: 这句话使我们产生错觉，以为自己懂了，但其实并没懂。

sentences.chinese: 虚假的安全感

detailed_translations.english: based on incorrect information or ideas

sentences.chinese: 熟悉的曲调

sentences.chinese: 回到熟悉的环境里让人松了一口气。

sentences.english: Beggars on the street are becoming a familiar sight .
sentences.chinese: 街上出现乞丐的情况逐渐变得屡见不鲜。

sentences.chinese: 哈里带我去了一家豪华餐厅，庆祝我们的结婚纪念日。

sentences.chinese: 我过去常幻想着在巴黎与一位艺术家同住。

sentences.chinese: 小孩子有时不能区分幻想与现实。

sentences.chinese: 海运业不大可能在9月份有所好转。

sentences.chinese: 就算是我不共戴天的仇敌，我也不希望他遭遇这样的命运。

sentences.chinese: 我真的很抱歉——都是我的错。

sentences.chinese: 那天晚上我没有睡好，但这是我自己的问题。

sentences.chinese: 〔英国及英联邦国家〕妇女协会全国联合会

sentences.chinese: 村民们说栅栏将限制公众进入山区。

sentences.chinese: 凶猛的看门狗

sentences.chinese: 城里的激烈战斗

sentences.chinese: 财政事务

detailed_translations.english: relating to money, taxes, debts etc that are owned and managed by the government

sentences.chinese: 钓鱼是他的一项业余爱好。

sentences.chinese: 特里下周末要到阿罗黑德湖钓鱼。

sentences.chinese: 这些腰带、和服和其他衣服都做得适合孩子穿。

sentences.english: The interest rate has been fixed at 6.5%.
sentences.chinese: 利率已经定为6.5%。

sentences.english: The shelves should be fixed to the wall with screws.
sentences.chinese: 架子应当用螺丝固定在墙上。

detailed_translations.english: to decide on a limit for something, especially prices, costs etc, so that they do not change

sentences.english: The classes begin and end at fixed times.
sentences.chinese: 上下课的时间都是固定不变的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 确定的；固执的；<美口>处境的；准备好的
detailed_translations.english: firmly fastened to a particular position

sentences.english: Children waving flags greeted the Russian leader.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们挥舞着旗帜，欢迎俄罗斯领导人。

sentences.english: the flag of Kenya
sentences.chinese: 肯尼亚国旗

sentences.english: the Spanish flag
sentences.chinese: 西班牙国旗

detailed_translations.english: a piece of cloth with a coloured pattern or picture on it that represents a country or organization

sentences.english: Two flashes mean danger.
sentences.chinese: 两次闪光表示危险。

sentences.english: Lightning flashed overhead.
sentences.chinese: 头顶上电光闪闪。

detailed_translations.english: a bright light that shines for a short time and then stops shining
to shine suddenly and brightly for a short time, or to make something shine in this way

sentences.english: Which flavour do you want - chocolate or vanilla?
sentences.chinese: 你要哪种味道的，巧克力还是香草？

detailed_translations.english: the particular taste of a food or drink

sentences.english: His attackers turned and fled.
sentences.chinese: 袭击他的人转身逃走了。

sentences.english: Masaari spent six months in prison before fleeing the country .
sentences.chinese: 正有蹲了六个月监狱，然后逃出了该国。

detailed_translations.english: to leave somewhere very quickly, in order to escape from danger

sentences.english: Atalanta was fleet of foot (= able to run quickly ) .
sentences.chinese: 阿塔兰特跑起来很快。

detailed_translations.english: fast or quick

sentences.english: We can be flexible about your starting date.
sentences.chinese: 你具体从哪天开始，我们可以灵活一点。

sentences.english: The government needs a more flexible approach to education.
sentences.chinese: 政府在处理教育问题上需要更加灵活。

detailed_translations.english: a person, plan etc that is flexible can change or be changed easily to suit any new situation

sentences.english: I looked up at the clouds floating in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 我仰望着天上的浮云。

sentences.english: Leaves floated gently down from the trees.
sentences.chinese: 叶子从树上轻轻飘落。

detailed_translations.english: if something floats, it moves slowly through the air or stays up in the air

detailed_translations.english: a large vehicle that is decorated to drive through the streets as part of a special event

sentences.english: The village was cut off by floods.
sentences.chinese: 那个村子因洪水而与外界中断了联系。

sentences.english: the worst floods for over fifty years
sentences.chinese: 五十多年来最严重的水灾

sentences.english: Towns and cities all over the country have been flooded.
sentences.chinese: 全国各地的城镇都被淹没了。

detailed_translations.english: a very large amount of water that covers an area that is usually dry
to cover a place with water, or to become covered with water

sentences.english: Fold the paper along the dotted line.
sentences.chinese: 沿虚线将纸折起来。

sentences.english: It’ll fit in if you fold it in half .
sentences.chinese: 对折的话就能放下了。

detailed_translations.english: to bend a piece of paper, cloth etc by laying or pressing one part over another
a line made in paper or material when you fold one part of it over another

sentences.english: I’m sure there are some folk who would rather they weren’t here.
sentences.chinese: 我敢肯定有些人宁愿自己不在这里。

sentences.english: Thanks to the folks at NBC.
sentences.chinese: 感谢全国广播公司的工作人员。

sentences.english: Is it OK if I call my folks?
sentences.chinese: 我打电话给家里人可以吗？

detailed_translations.english: people

sentences.english: What a fool she had been to think that he would stay.
sentences.chinese: 她竟然那么傻，以为他会留下来。

sentences.english: Like a fool, I accepted straight away.
sentences.chinese: 我像个傻子，立刻就接受了。

sentences.english: You silly old fool !
sentences.chinese: 你这个大傻瓜！

sentences.english: Even art experts were fooled.
sentences.chinese: 连艺术品专家也被骗了。

detailed_translations.english: a stupid person or someone who has done something stupid
to trick someone into believing something that is not true

sentences.english: The weather forecast is good for tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 天气预报说明天是晴天。

sentences.english: Rain was forecast for the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 预报周末有雨。

detailed_translations.english: a description of what is likely to happen in the future, based on the information that you have now

sentences.english: Some of the local people are suspicious of foreigners.
sentences.chinese: 有些当地人不信任外国人。

detailed_translations.english: someone who comes from a different country

sentences.english: a tropical forest
sentences.chinese: 热带森林

sentences.english: the danger of forest fires
sentences.chinese: 发生森林火灾的危险

detailed_translations.english: a large area of land that is covered with trees

sentences.english: We oppose racism in all its forms.
sentences.chinese: 我们反对各种形式的种族主义。

sentences.english: The female form is a thing of beauty.
sentences.chinese: 女性形体是一种美。

sentences.english: The rocks were formed more than 4,000 million years ago.
sentences.chinese: 这些岩石是40多亿年前形成的。

detailed_translations.english: the way something is or appears to be

sentences.english: We’re still searching for a peace formula.
sentences.chinese: 我们仍在寻找和平方案。

sentences.english: There is no magic formula (= a method that is certain to be successful ) that will transform sorrow into happiness.
sentences.chinese: 没有妙方可以化悲为喜。

sentences.english: With viewing figures up a million, the programme has a winning formula .
sentences.chinese: 收视人数增加了一百万，这个节目的确拥有吸引观众的法宝。

sentences.chinese: 计算距离的公式

detailed_translations.english: a series of numbers or letters that represent a mathematical or scientific rule

sentences.chinese: 嗨！你好吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 嗨！（表示问候或用以唤起注意）

trans: 精彩场面 vt. 加亮

sentences.chinese: 你的简历应该突出自己的技能和成绩。

sentences.chinese: 我清楚地表明我对他不感兴趣，但他不明白我的意思。

sentences.chinese: 她站在那里，双手叉腰瞪着他。

sentences.chinese: 她用图表来说明她的论述。

sentences.chinese: 我们一旦得过这种病，就获得了终身免疫力。

sentences.chinese: …书写用具。

sentences.chinese: 它们被称作“超级电车”，这是暗指它们比先前的型号更先进。

sentences.chinese: 这些岩石内的高辐射水平显示它们是由火山作用形成的。

sentences.chinese: 我们参观了学校，对它的印象很好。

sentences.chinese: 有一些倒下的树木在坚硬的泥地上留下了清晰的压痕。

sentences.chinese: 这些数字看上去确实很可观。

sentences.chinese: 我们的成绩这个月有所提高。

sentences.chinese: 窗帘短了一英寸。

sentences.chinese: 本地的年降雨量不到15英寸。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring length, equal to 2.54 centimetres. There are 12 inches in a foot.

sentences.english: It’s incredible that he survived the fall.
sentences.chinese: 他跌下去竟然能够生还，真不可思议。

sentences.english: It’s incredible how much Tom has changed since he met Sally.

sentences.chinese: 没人发现这些错误，真让我无法相信。

sentences.chinese: …消费价格指数。

sentences.chinese: 危机的进一步升级现在看来已不可避免。

detailed_translations.english: certain to happen and impossible to avoid

sentences.chinese: 带有这种病毒的人可能毫无症状，却仍可能传染他人。

sentences.english: He thought they might infect others with their bourgeois ideas.
sentences.chinese: 他认为他们可能用中产阶级思想去影响别人。

sentences.chinese: 宝宝耳朵感染了。

detailed_translations.english: a disease that affects a particular part of your body and is caused by bacteria or a virus

sentences.english: They would inform him of any progress they had made.
sentences.chinese: 他们将把自己所取得的任何进展都告诉他。

sentences.chinese: 我女儿告诉我她怀孕了。

sentences.chinese: 把所有食材都放在一个大碗里。

sentences.english: The food is home-cooked using fresh ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 这种食物是用新鲜的食材在家里烹制的。

detailed_translations.english: one of the foods that you use to make a particular food or dish

sentences.chinese: 斯坦最初想进医学院。

sentences.chinese: 起初，我以为我只会在那儿待一年。

detailed_translations.english: at the beginning

sentences.chinese: 我希望我的儿子能表现得再主动一些。

sentences.chinese: 别老是要我给你出主意，发挥一下你自己的决断能力吧。

sentences.english: Lt. Carlos was not obeying orders. He acted on his own initiative (= he was not told what to do ).
sentences.chinese: 卡洛斯中尉没有服从命令，而是自作主张。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to make decisions and take action without waiting for someone to tell you what to do

sentences.english: an inner room
sentences.chinese: 内室

sentences.english: inner London
sentences.chinese: 伦敦中心区

sentences.english: the inner ear

sentences.english: Yoga gives me a sense of inner calm.
sentences.chinese: 练习瑜伽使我感到内心平和。

detailed_translations.english: on the inside or close to the centre of something

sentences.chinese: 没人肯相信我是清白的。

sentences.english: The court found him innocent and he was released.
sentences.chinese: 法庭判他无罪，他被释放了。

sentences.chinese: 她过去一直认为格雷格在关于女人方面是一个不可救药的无知者。

sentences.english: I don’t know who sent the gift, but I’ll make some inquiries.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道礼物是谁送的，但我会打听一下。

sentences.chinese: 警方已开始对谋杀案展开调查

detailed_translations.english: a question you ask in order to get information

sentences.chinese: 我下车查看损坏情况。

sentences.chinese: 租金合理，而且位置也非常好。

sentences.chinese: 绿茶主要来自中国或日本。

sentences.chinese: 大厅里大约有15人，大部分是女性。

sentences.chinese: 他责怪他的父母，主要是责怪他爸爸。

trans: n.运动；动作；动机vi.打手势vt.示意

sentences.english: She motioned for the locked front doors to be opened.
sentences.chinese: 她打手势示意把锁着的前门打开。

sentences.english: He stood aside and motioned Don to the door.
sentences.chinese: 他站在一边，示意唐到门口。

sentences.english: A good teacher has to be able to motivate her students.
sentences.chinese: 好教师必须能够激发学生的积极性。

sentences.chinese: 他登上楼梯，慢慢环顾四周。

sentences.chinese: 珠穆朗玛峰

sentences.english: I have understood my mum. She has done all the things for the sake of me.
sentences.chinese: 现在我对未来充满了信心，我理解了妈妈，她所做的一切都是为了我。

sentences.chinese: 放松腹部肌肉，然后再绷紧。

sentences.chinese: 童话故事《灰姑娘》的音乐剧版

sentences.chinese: 金在音乐事业的开始阶段只为黑人观众演奏。

sentences.chinese: 有天赋的年轻音乐家

detailed_translations.english: a person who plays a musical instrument or writes music, especially as a job

sentences.english: I didn’t like Dev, and the feeling seemed to be mutual.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢德夫，他好像也不喜欢我。

sentences.english: The two men were a mutual admiration society , gushing about how much they were learning from each other.
sentences.chinese: 两个男人互相吹捧，盛赞对方让自己受益匪浅。

sentences.english: Twenty years after the event, his death remains a mystery .
sentences.chinese: 事情过去二十年了，他的死仍然是个谜。

sentences.chinese: 她脑子里在想些什么对他来说始终是个谜。

sentences.chinese: “他为什么这么做？” “我不知道，这完全是个谜。”

sentences.chinese: 警察一直没有侦破格雷失踪的谜案。

sentences.chinese: 但为什么会有人想杀死杰克呢？疑团越来越深了。

sentences.chinese: 后来那些画的命运如何是个不解之谜。

sentences.english: I don’t know how he got the job – it’s one of life’s little mysteries .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他是怎么得到那份工作的——那永远是个小小的谜。

sentences.english: How life began on Earth is one of the great mysteries of science.
sentences.chinese: 地球生命的起源是一大科学谜团。

detailed_translations.english: an event, situation etc that people do not understand or cannot explain because they do not know enough about it

sentences.english: a book of Greek myths
sentences.chinese: 一本关于希腊神话的图书

sentences.english: the giants of myth and fairytale
sentences.chinese: 神话和童话里的巨人

detailed_translations.english: an ancient story, especially one invented in order to explain natural or historical events

sentences.english: Singapore has many native species of palm.
sentences.chinese: 新加坡有很多土生的棕榈树种。

sentences.english: You can always tell the difference between the tourists and the natives.
sentences.chinese: 游客与当地人之间的区别一望即知。

detailed_translations.english: growing, living, produced etc in one particular place
someone who lives in a place all the time or has lived there a long time

sentences.english: After a while, we naturally started talking about the children.
sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，我们自然而然地谈起了孩子。

sentences.english: naturally occurring chemicals
sentences.chinese: 天然存在的化学物质

detailed_translations.english: in a way that you would expect

sentences.english: a naval officer
sentences.chinese: 海军军官

sentences.english: naval battles
sentences.chinese: 海战

detailed_translations.english: relating to the navy or used by the navy

sentences.english: the British Navy
sentences.chinese: 英国海军

sentences.english: He joined the navy during the war.
sentences.chinese: 他在战争期间参加了海军。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a country’s military forces that fights at sea

sentences.english: Lucy was staying in the nearby town of Hamilton.
sentences.chinese: 露西当时住在附近的汉密尔顿镇。

sentences.english: He might easily have been seen by someone who lived nearby.
sentences.chinese: 他可能很容易被住在附近的人看到。

sentences.english: The helicopter crashed to earth nearby.
sentences.chinese: 直升机坠毁在附近的地面上。

detailed_translations.english: not far away
a short distance from sb/sth; not far away

sentences.english: neat handwriting
sentences.chinese: 工整的笔迹

sentences.english: His clothes were always neat and clean.
sentences.chinese: 他的衣服总是很整洁。

sentences.english: Everything in the house was neat and tidy.
sentences.chinese: 房子里的每样物品都干净整齐。

sentences.english: She arranged the books in a nice neat pile.
sentences.chinese: 她把书摞成整齐的一堆。

detailed_translations.english: tidy and carefully arranged

sentences.english: The care of old people necessarily involves quite a lot of heavy lifting.
sentences.chinese: 照顾老年人必定要干很多搬重物的活儿。

detailed_translations.english: in a way that cannot be different or be avoided

sentences.english: Mike rubbed the back of his neck.
sentences.chinese: 迈克揉了揉后颈。

sentences.english: You have a lot of tension in your neck muscles.
sentences.chinese: 你的颈部肌肉很紧张。

sentences.english: He patted his horse’s neck.
sentences.chinese: 他拍了拍马脖子。

sentences.english: She had a mass of golden hair, which she wore in a coil at the nape  of her neck.
sentences.chinese: 她有一头金发，盘在脖子后面。

sentences.english: The dog picked up the puppy and carried it by the scruff of the neck into the house.
sentences.chinese: 那条狗叼住小狗的后颈，把它叼进了屋子。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body that joins your head to your shoulders, or the same part of an animal or bird

name: negative
trans: a.否定的；消极的；负的n.负数;底片

sentences.english: students with a negative attitude to school
sentences.chinese: 对上学抱消极态度的学生

sentences.english: They have a uniformly negative image of the police.
sentences.chinese: 他们都对警察印象不好。

sentences.english: Jean rarely sounded so negative about her mother.
sentences.chinese: 琼很少这么说她母亲不好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 否定的，消极的；负的，阴性的
detailed_translations.english: considering only the bad qualities of a situation, person etc and not the good ones

detailed_translations.chinese: 负片， 底片； 负数
detailed_translations.english: an image on a photographic film that shows dark areas as light and light areas as dark, from which the final picture is printed

sentences.english: One of the neighbors complained about the noise from the party.
sentences.chinese: 有位邻居抱怨聚会太吵。

sentences.english: FBI agents were interviewing all their friends and neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 联邦调查局人员正在向他们所有的朋友和邻居问话。

sentences.english: Our next-door neighbours (= the people who live in the house next to us ) say they’ll look after our cat for us while we’re away.
sentences.chinese: 我们隔壁的邻居说，我们不在时他们会照顾我们的猫。

detailed_translations.english: someone who lives next to you or near you

sentences.english: a condition which affects the nerves in the back
sentences.chinese: 影响背部神经的疾病

sentences.english: She finally found the nerve to tell him she wanted a divorce.
sentences.chinese: 她终于鼓起勇气告诉他自己想离婚。

detailed_translations.english: nerves are parts inside your body which look like threads and carry messages between the brain and other parts of the body

sentences.english: I wish you’d stop looking at me like that. You’re making me nervous.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你不要再那样看着我了，你让我紧张。

sentences.english: By the time I got into the interview I was a nervous wreck (= was extremely nervous ).
sentences.chinese: 到了面试的时候，我紧张得要命。

detailed_translations.english: worried or frightened about something, and unable to relax

sentences.english: We netted three fish in under an hour.
sentences.chinese: 不到一小时我们就网住了三条鱼。

detailed_translations.english: to catch sth, especially fish, in a net

sentences.english: What you said was true. It was, nevertheless, a little unkind.
sentences.chinese: 你说的都是实话，只不过有点刻薄。

sentences.english: Although the market has been flat, residential property costs remain high. Nevertheless, the fall-off in demand has had an impact on resale values.
sentences.chinese: 尽管市场一直疲软，房价持续偏高。然而需求的减少还是对二手房价格产生了影响。

detailed_translations.english: You use nevertheless when saying something that contrasts with what has just been said.
in spite of a fact that you have just mentioned

sentences.english: She was young at the time, and newly married.
sentences.chinese: 那时她还年轻，刚结婚。

detailed_translations.english: recently

sentences.english: a recurring nightmare
sentences.chinese: 一再出现的噩梦

detailed_translations.english: a very frightening dream

sentences.english: The woman greeted us with a nod of the head.
sentences.chinese: 那个女人向我们点点头打招呼。

sentences.english: I showed the doorman my card and he gave a friendly nod.
sentences.chinese: 我向门卫出示了卡片，他友善地点了点头。

detailed_translations.english: an act of nodding
to move your head up and down, especially in order to show agreement or understanding

sentences.english: What’s that noise?
sentences.chinese: 那是什么声音？

sentences.english: Try not to make a noise when you go upstairs.
sentences.chinese: 上楼时尽量不要弄出声。

sentences.english: There was a lot of noise outside.
sentences.chinese: 外面很吵闹。

sentences.english: Noise levels have been reduced by 20%.
sentences.chinese: 噪音水平下降了20%。

detailed_translations.english: a sound, especially one that is loud, unpleasant, or frightening

sentences.english: The journey normally takes about two hours.
sentences.chinese: 这段旅程通常需要大约两小时。

sentences.english: Normally, I park behind the theatre.
sentences.chinese: 通常我把车停在剧院后面。

sentences.english: The system seems to be working normally now.
sentences.chinese: 目前该系统似乎运行正常。

detailed_translations.english: usually

sentences.english: Someone punched him on the nose.
sentences.chinese: 有人一拳打在他的鼻子上。

detailed_translations.english: the part of a person’s or animal’s face used for smelling or breathing

sentences.english: a noted author
sentences.chinese: 著名作家

detailed_translations.english: well known or famous, especially because of some special quality or ability

sentences.english: She had no notion what he meant.
sentences.chinese: 她根本不明白他是什么意思。

sentences.english: misguided notions of male superiority
sentences.chinese: 男尊女卑的错误观念

detailed_translations.english: an idea, belief, or opinion

sentences.english: Nowhere is drug abuse more of a problem than in the US.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么地方的吸毒问题比美国更严重。

detailed_translations.english: not in any place or to any place

sentences.english: Numerous attempts have been made to hide the truth.
sentences.chinese: 为掩盖事实作了很多尝试。

sentences.english: The two leaders have worked together on numerous occasions.
sentences.chinese: 那两位领导人已经多次合作。

detailed_translations.english: many

sentences.english: The nurse is coming to give you an injection.
sentences.chinese: 护士会来给你打针。

sentences.english: The school nurse sent Sara home.
sentences.chinese: 学校的护士送萨拉回家。

sentences.english: a male nurse
sentences.chinese: 男护士

sentences.english: a senior nurse
sentences.chinese: 高级护士

sentences.english: a student nurse (= someone who is learning to be a nurse )
sentences.chinese: 实习护士

sentences.english: a psychiatric nurse (= a nurse for people who are mentally ill )
sentences.chinese: 精神病院护士

sentences.english: He’s been nursing an elderly relative.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在照顾一位年老的亲戚。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to look after people who are ill or injured, usually in a hospital
to look after someone who is ill or injured

sentences.english: He vowed to achieve certain objectives before the end of his presidency.
sentences.chinese: 他立誓要在他的总统任期结束之前实现某些目标。

sentences.english: the best way to accomplish your objectives
sentences.chinese: 完成目标的最佳方法

sentences.english: The degree program has two main objectives.
sentences.chinese: 该学位课程有两个主要目标。

sentences.english: Managers should set specific performance objectives for their teams.
sentences.chinese: 经理应该为自己的团队制定明确的绩效目标。

sentences.english: The main objective was to improve children’s knowledge of geography.
sentences.chinese: 主要目的是要增长儿童的地理知识。

sentences.english: A clear objective was set and adhered to.
sentences.chinese: 定下了明确的目标并坚持到底。

sentences.english: One of your first business objectives should be to get your own office.
sentences.chinese: 你的首要工作目标之一应该是拥有自己的办公室。

detailed_translations.english: something that you are trying hard to achieve, especially in business or politics

sentences.english: Scientists have observed a drop in ozone levels over the Antarctic.
sentences.chinese: 科学家已经观察到南极洲上方的臭氧浓度有所下降。

sentences.english: Predators have been observed to avoid attacking brightly coloured species.
sentences.chinese: 据观察发现，食肉动物会避免袭击色彩鲜艳的物种。

sentences.english: The army was observing a ceasefire.
sentences.chinese: 军队当时在遵守一项停火协议。

sentences.english: ‘Sid looks ill,’ Doherty observed.
sentences.chinese: “锡德看上去病了。”多尔蒂说道。

detailed_translations.english: to see and notice something

sentences.english: political observers
sentences.chinese: 政治观察员

sentences.english: Observers are predicting a fall in interest rates.
sentences.chinese: 观察员预测利率会下降。

detailed_translations.english: someone who regularly watches or pays attention to particular things, events, situations etc

sentences.english: These conditions no longer obtain.
sentences.chinese: 这些状况已不复存在。

detailed_translations.chinese: 通用， 流行； 存在
detailed_translations.english: if a situation, system, or rule obtains, it continues to exist
to get something that you want, especially through your own effort, skill, or work

sentences.english: He made occasional visits to London.
sentences.chinese: 他有时候会去伦敦。

sentences.english: They had an occasional coffee together after shopping.
sentences.chinese: 他们偶尔会在购物后一起喝杯咖啡。

sentences.english: He only has occasional use of a car.
sentences.chinese: 他只是偶尔用一下汽车。

sentences.english: We should have enough money for the occasional trip.
sentences.chinese: 我们的钱应该足够偶尔出去旅行一次的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 偶尔的， 间或发生的
detailed_translations.english: happening sometimes but not often or regularly

sentences.english: Please state your name, address and occupation.
sentences.chinese: 请写明你的姓名、地址和职业。

sentences.english: professional and managerial occupations
sentences.chinese: 专业及管理工作

sentences.english: manual occupations
sentences.chinese: 体力工作

sentences.english: the German occupation of France
sentences.chinese: 德军对法国的占领

detailed_translations.english: a job or profession

sentences.english: She stood on the beach, gazing at the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 她站在海滩上，凝视着大海。

sentences.english: I like to swim in the ocean when it’s warm enough.
sentences.chinese: 海水足够暖的时候，我喜欢在海里游泳。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洋， 海洋； 许多， 大量
detailed_translations.english: the great mass of salt water that covers most of the Earth’s surface

sentences.english: It's already 9 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 已经9点钟了。

sentences.english: The meeting is at 10 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 开会时间是10点钟。

detailed_translations.english: one of the times when the clock shows the exact hour as a number from 1 to 12

sentences.english: His solicitor said he committed the offence because he was heavily in debt.
sentences.chinese: 他的律师说他犯罪是因为欠下巨债。

detailed_translations.english: an illegal action or a crime

sentences.english: I found her remarks deeply offensive.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得她的话令人非常恼火。

sentences.english: offensive behaviour
sentences.chinese: 无礼的行为

detailed_translations.chinese: 冒犯的，无礼的；进攻的，攻击性的
detailed_translations.english: very rude or insulting and likely to upset people
a planned military attack involving large forces over a long period

sentences.english: ...the holiest of the Shinto rituals, where offerings are made at night to the great Sun.
sentences.chinese: …神道教仪式中最神圣的部分，祭品在夜间献给伟大的太阳神。

detailed_translations.english: something that is given to God

name: one's
trans: pron. [one pron.的所有格] 一个人的

sentences.english: She watched him walk onto the platform.
sentences.chinese: 她看着他走上站台。

sentences.english: Don’t jump onto (= into ) the bus while it’s moving.
sentences.chinese: 别在公共汽车开动时跳上车。

sentences.english: Pour the syrup on to the egg mixture.
sentences.chinese: 把糖浆倒进鸡蛋混合料中。

sentences.english: The car rolled over onto its side.
sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车侧翻过来了。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that someone or something moves to a position on a surface, area, or object

sentences.english: the opening match of the season
sentences.chinese: 本赛季的首场比赛

sentences.english: the opening chapter of the book
sentences.chinese: 本书的第一章

sentences.english: at the opening of the trial
sentences.chinese: 审判伊始

detailed_translations.english: first or beginning
the beginning or first part of something

sentences.english: We go to the opera (= go to a performance of opera ) regularly.
sentences.chinese: 我们常去听歌剧。

sentences.english: an opera singer
sentences.chinese: 歌剧演员

detailed_translations.english: a musical play in which all of the words are sung

sentences.english: Hello, operator? Could you put me through to Room 31?
sentences.chinese: 喂，接线员吗？请帮我接31号房间。

sentences.english: computers which can be used by untrained operators
sentences.chinese: 未经训练的操作者也可使用的电脑

detailed_translations.english: someone who works on a telephone switchboard, who you can call for help

sentences.english: She bowled out her opponent.
sentences.chinese: 她打败了她的对手。

sentences.english: The soldier jabbed at his opponent.
sentences.chinese: 那个战士猛击他的对手。

sentences.english: He avowed himself an opponent of all alliances.
sentences.chinese: 他声称他是所有联盟的反对者。

detailed_translations.english: someone who you try to defeat in a competition, game, fight, or argument

sentences.english: Congress is continuing to oppose the President’s health care budget.
sentences.chinese: 国会继续反对总统的医疗保健预算。

detailed_translations.english: to disagree with something such as a plan or idea and try to prevent it from happening or succeeding

sentences.english: I am utterly opposed to any form of terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 我坚决反对任何形式的恐怖主义。

sentences.english: The principles of capitalism and socialism are diametrically opposed (= completely opposite ).
sentences.chinese: 资本主义的原则与社会主义的原则截然相反。

detailed_translations.english: If you are opposed to something, you disagree with it or disapprove of it.

sentences.english: I thought the medicine would make him sleep, but it had the opposite effect.
sentences.chinese: 我以为这药会让他睡觉，但是它却起了反作用。

sentences.english: At the opposite extreme, Ashworth’s style is very simple and modern.
sentences.chinese: 截然相反的是，阿什沃思的风格非常简单和现代。

sentences.english: Bob was quicker than Ed? It’s usually the opposite way round.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃比埃德快？通常是反过来的。

detailed_translations.english: as different as possible from something else
a person or thing that is as different as possible from someone or something else

sentences.english: Depending on your circumstances you can opt for one method or the other.
sentences.chinese: 根据自己的情况，你可以选择这种或那种方法。

detailed_translations.english: to choose one thing or do one thing instead of another

sentences.english: orange juice
sentences.chinese: 橙汁

sentences.english: orange peel
sentences.chinese: 橙子皮

sentences.english: Peel the oranges and divide them into segments.
sentences.chinese: 把橙子去皮，然后切成片。

sentences.english: orange groves (= where orange trees grow )
sentences.chinese: 柑橘园

detailed_translations.english: a round fruit that has a thick orange skin and is divided into parts inside

sentences.english: It’s just an ordinary camera.
sentences.chinese: 这只是普通的相机。

sentences.english: The book is about ordinary people.
sentences.chinese: 这本书描写的是普通人。

sentences.english: Art should be part of ordinary life.
sentences.chinese: 艺术应该是日常生活的一部分。

sentences.english: It is good because it is written in friendly, ordinary language.
sentences.chinese: 它很不错，因为它是用平易近人的日常语言写的。

detailed_translations.english: average, common, or usual, not different or special

name: organized
trans: adj. 1> [常构成复合字]有组织的

sentences.english: The tradition has its origins in the Middle Ages.
sentences.chinese: 这一传统源于中世纪。

sentences.english: old folk tales of unknown origin
sentences.chinese: 起源不明的古老民间传说

detailed_translations.chinese: 起源， 起因； 出身， 血统
detailed_translations.english: the place or situation in which something begins to exist

sentences.english: The family originally came from France.
sentences.chinese: 这个家族最初来自法国。

sentences.english: The building was originally used as a prison.
sentences.chinese: 这幢建筑最初用作监狱。

sentences.english: We originally intended to stay for just a few days.
sentences.chinese: 我们原先打算只逗留几天。

sentences.english: Originally, we had planned a tour of Scotland but we didn’t go in the end.
sentences.chinese: 起先我们计划到苏格兰旅游，但最后没有成行。

detailed_translations.english: in the beginning, before other things happened or before other things changed

sentences.english: I realize I ought to have told you about it.
sentences.chinese: 我意识到我本该告诉你这件事的。

detailed_translations.english: You use ought to have with a past participle to indicate that although it was best or correct for someone to do something in the past, they did not actually do it.

sentences.english: We prepared ourselves for the long journey ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我们为将要开始的长途旅行做好了准备。

sentences.english: It was strange seeing ourselves on television.
sentences.chinese: 在电视上看到自己感觉很奇怪。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking to show that they and one or more other people are affected by their own action

sentences.english: People who had heard the evidence at the trial were surprised at the outcome.
sentences.chinese: 在审判过程中听过证词的人都对此结果感到吃惊。

detailed_translations.english: the final result of a meeting, discussion, war etc – used especially when no one knows what it will be until it actually happens

sentences.english: a research proposal outline
sentences.chinese: 研究计划梗概

detailed_translations.english: the main ideas or facts about something, without the details
to describe something in a general way, giving the main points but not the details

sentences.english: Output is up 30% on last year.
sentences.chinese: 产量比去年提高了30%。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of goods or work produced by a person, machine, factory etc
if a computer outputs information, it produces it

sentences.english: an outstanding example of a 13th-century castle
sentences.chinese: 13世纪城堡的杰出典范

sentences.english: an outstanding success
sentences.chinese: 了不起的成功

sentences.english: His performance was outstanding.
sentences.chinese: 他的表演相当出色。

detailed_translations.chinese: 杰出的；显著的；未解决的；未偿付的
detailed_translations.english: extremely good

sentences.english: He struggled to overcome his shyness.
sentences.chinese: 他努力克服自己的羞怯。

sentences.english: Her financial problems could no longer be overcome.
sentences.chinese: 她的经济困难再也无法解决。

sentences.english: Australia overcame the Netherlands 2-1.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚队2比1战胜了荷兰队。

detailed_translations.english: to successfully control a feeling or problem that prevents you from achieving something

sentences.english: He became a millionaire overnight.
sentences.chinese: 他一夜之间就成了百万富翁。

detailed_translations.english: suddenly or surprisingly quickly
happening during the night or for the night

sentences.english: Chris is going to work overseas.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯要去国外工作。

sentences.chinese: 大部分申请来自海外。

sentences.chinese: 英国空军虽然处境极为不利，但还是完成了任务。

detailed_translations.english: very large or greater, more important etc than any other

sentences.english: How much do I owe you (= often used to show that you want to pay for something )?
sentences.chinese: 我该付你多少钱？

sentences.chinese: 他的成功是靠勤奋工作。

sentences.english: The price of home ownership is increasing.
sentences.chinese: 房价在不断上涨。

detailed_translations.english: the fact of owning something

sentences.english: He quickened his pace , longing to be home.
sentences.chinese: 他加快步伐，盼望着早点回到家中。

sentences.english: Traffic slowed to a walking pace.

sentences.english: the Warsaw pact
sentences.chinese: 华沙条约

sentences.chinese: 你的手臂很疼吗？

sentences.chinese: 脖子肿起来了，一碰就疼。

sentences.english: Buckingham Palace
sentences.chinese: 白金汉宫

detailed_translations.english: the official home of a person of very high rank, especially a king or queen – often used in names

sentences.english: He looked very pale and drawn.
sentences.chinese: 他看上去非常苍白憔悴。

sentences.english: pale blue curtains
sentences.chinese: 淡蓝色的窗帘

detailed_translations.chinese: 苍白的,灰白的；浅的,暗淡的
detailed_translations.english: having a skin colour that is very white, or whiter than it usually is

sentences.english: a frying pan
sentences.chinese: 炒锅

sentences.english: pots and pans
sentences.chinese: 锅碗瓢盆

sentences.english: Cook the pasta in a large pan of boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 把意大利面放在一大锅开水里煮。

detailed_translations.chinese: 平底锅；盘状的器皿；淘盘子，金盘，秤盘

detailed_translations.chinese: 淘金；在浅锅中烹调（食物）；[非正式用语]严厉的批评
detailed_translations.english: to wash soil in a metal container in order to separate gold from other substances

sentences.english: A panel of experts has looked at the proposal.
sentences.chinese: 一组专家审核了那项提议。

sentences.english: There will be at least three senior doctors on the panel.

detailed_translations.english: a group of people with skills or specialist knowledge who have been chosen to give advice or opinions on a particular subject

sentences.chinese: 她的脸因恐慌而变相了。

sentences.english: The panic-stricken fled in all directions.
sentences.chinese: 惊慌的人群向四面八方逃去。

sentences.chinese: 由于我纯粹因惊慌而做的事，他们认为我很有勇气。

sentences.chinese: 世界上最古老的议会民主制

detailed_translations.chinese: 议会的；国会的；议会制度的
detailed_translations.english: relating to or governed by a parliament

name: part
trans: vt.分开，拆散n.一部分;零件；角色

sentences.english: For part of the day, you will be outside doing practical work.
sentences.chinese: 你们每天将有一部分时间在户外实际操作。

sentences.english: Lay all the parts out before you start assembling the model.
sentences.chinese: 开始组装模型之前把所有的零件都摆放出来。

detailed_translations.english: a piece or feature of something such as an object, area, event, or period of time

sentences.english: Some members refused to participate.
sentences.chinese: 有些会员拒绝参加。

detailed_translations.english: to take part in an activity or event

sentences.english: The poor weather was partly responsible for the crash.
sentences.chinese: 天气不好是造成坠机事故的部分原因。

sentences.english: The company’s problems are partly due to bad management.
sentences.chinese: 那家公司的问题部分是由于管理不善造成的。

sentences.english: It is partly because of her sick mother that she hasn’t taken the job abroad.
sentences.chinese: 她没有接受那份去国外的工作，部分原因是母亲病了。

sentences.english: It’s one of the most successful partnerships in the country.
sentences.chinese: 它是该国最成功的合伙企业之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 合伙；[经管] 合伙企业；合作关系；合伙契约
detailed_translations.english: the state of being a partner in business

sentences.english: My office is just along the passage.
sentences.chinese: 我的办公室就在过道旁边。

sentences.english: We walked down a narrow passage to the back of the building.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着一条狭窄的通道来到大楼的后面。

sentences.english: an underground passage
sentences.chinese: 地下通道

sentences.english: The bridge isn’t strong enough to allow the passage of heavy vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 那座桥不够坚固，无法让重型车辆通过。

detailed_translations.english: a way through something

sentences.chinese: 司机和乘客均未受伤。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is travelling in a vehicle, plane, boat etc, but is not driving it or working on it

sentences.chinese: 那件事激起了人们强烈的情绪。

sentences.english: Gardening was her great passion.
sentences.chinese: 她酷爱园艺。

detailed_translations.chinese: 强烈的情感，激情；强烈的爱好，热爱
detailed_translations.english: a very strong belief or feeling about something

sentences.english: I walked nervously up the garden path towards the front door.
sentences.chinese: 我提心吊胆地沿着花园的小道向前门走去。

sentences.english: a well-worn path across the grass
sentences.chinese: 草地上被踏出的小径

sentences.chinese: 沿着河边的小路走到那座桥。

sentences.chinese: 通往避暑别墅的小径

detailed_translations.english: a track that has been made deliberately or made by many people walking over the same ground

to stop speaking or doing something for a short time before starting again

sentences.english: We had a peaceful afternoon without the children.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们不在，我们度过了一个宁静的下午。

sentences.english: It’s very peaceful out here in the woods.
sentences.chinese: 这树林里真安静。

sentences.english: the use of nuclear power for peaceful purposes
sentences.chinese: 核能的和平利用

detailed_translations.english: a peaceful time, place, or situation is quiet and calm without any worry or excitement

sentences.chinese: 白雪覆盖的山顶

sentences.english: jagged peaks
sentences.chinese: 嶙峋的山峰

sentences.chinese: 那是对该产品需求最旺的时期。

used to talk about the best, highest, or greatest level or amount of something

sentences.chinese: 美国儿童的数学成绩不如日本的同龄儿童。

sentences.chinese: 员工由同事培训。

sentences.chinese: 萨拉把外套挂在衣钩上。

sentences.chinese: 一张用钉子钉起来的桌子

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of wood, metal, or plastic that is attached to a wall or fits into a hole, used especially to hang things on or to fasten things together

sentences.chinese: 圆珠笔

sentences.english: a felt-tip pen

sentences.english: a pen and ink drawing
sentences.chinese: 钢笔画

detailed_translations.english: an instrument for writing or drawing with ink

sentences.chinese: 禁止乱扔垃圾。 违者罚款500美元。

sentences.chinese: 提前支取这笔钱将被处以10%的罚金。

sentences.chinese: 一旦定罪，他可能会被判处死刑。

sentences.chinese: 公共汽车费是80便士。

sentences.chinese: 从多少岁可以开始领取养老金？

sentences.chinese: 如果你是自由职业者，应该考虑办理私人养老金事宜。

sentences.chinese: 许多人发现仅凭国家基本养老金不能养活自己。

sentences.chinese: 盐和胡椒粉

to add pepper to food

sentences.chinese: 利息下降了6个百分点。

sentences.chinese: 演出之前觉得紧张再正常不过了。

sentences.chinese: 这笔生意完全合法。

sentences.chinese: 他放弃了固定工作，为的是当一名自由职业者。

sentences.chinese: 他请求离开房间的许可。

sentences.chinese: 没有许可他们不得离开这个国家。

sentences.chinese: 只允许在公共休息室里抽烟。

sentences.chinese: 他血液中的酒精含量超出了允许的水平。

sentences.chinese: 尽管个性不同，他们还是成了最好的朋友。

sentences.chinese: 总经理亲自写信向我表示感谢。

sentences.chinese: 所有人员都将拿到安保徽章。

sentences.chinese: 父亲的死使他对生活有了全新的看法。

sentences.chinese: 他们有两只宠物，一只猫和一只狗。

sentences.english: We weren’t allowed to keep pets at school.
sentences.chinese: 学校里不许我们养宠物。

sentences.english: Rabbits make good pets .
sentences.chinese: 兔子是很好的宠物。

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["pet food"]}
sentences.chinese: 宠物粮食

sentences.english: a pet shop
sentences.chinese: 宠物商店

sentences.chinese: 警察伸出手，摸了摸那条猎狼犬。

detailed_translations.english: an animal such as a cat or a dog which you keep and care for at home

sentences.chinese: 处于试验阶段的一种新药

sentences.english: It’s just a phase he’s going through.
sentences.chinese: 这只是他要经历的一个阶段。

detailed_translations.english: one of the stages of a process of development or change

sentences.chinese: 埃玛在大学攻读哲学。

sentences.chinese: 不可能仅通过说某个词或短语就能把人催眠。

sentences.chinese: “适者生存”这一说法最早是谁说的？

sentences.chinese: 他把盘子在一摞书上放稳。

sentences.chinese: 他必须服药控制血压。

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["sleeping pills"]}

sentences.chinese: 一瓶维生素片

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…制成丸剂；使服用药丸；抢劫，掠夺（古语）

sentences.chinese: 航空公司飞行员

sentences.english: a fighter pilot

sentences.chinese: 计划是在明年夏天实施一个试验性方案。

detailed_translations.english: someone who operates the controls of an aircraft or spacecraft

to guide an aircraft, spacecraft, or ship as its pilot

sentences.english: a diamond pin
sentences.chinese: 一枚钻石胸针

sentences.chinese: 他把姓名牌别在自己的短外套上。

sentences.english: Her room was decorated in bright pinks and purples.
sentences.chinese: 她的房间装饰成明亮的粉红色和紫色。

sentences.chinese: 她穿着粉色的衣服来了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 粉红色；化身，典范；石竹花；头面人物
detailed_translations.english: a pale red colour

detailed_translations.english: to prick lightly with a sword or rapier

detailed_translations.chinese: 粉红的；比较激进的；石竹科的；脸色发红的
detailed_translations.english: pale red

sentences.english: a water pipe
sentences.chinese: 水管

sentences.english: a frozen waste pipe
sentences.chinese: 冻住的污水管

sentences.english: copper pipes
sentences.chinese: 铜管

sentences.chinese: 厨房的一根管道爆裂，弄得满地都是水。

detailed_translations.english: a tube through which a liquid or gas flows

sentences.english: Dad first went down the pit (= worked in a coal mine ) when he was 15 years old.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸第一次下煤矿井时才15岁。

sentences.english: a national strike against pit closures
sentences.chinese: 抗议关闭煤矿井的全国性罢工

detailed_translations.chinese: 矿井；深坑；陷阱；（物体或人体表面上的）凹陷；（英国剧场的）正厅后排；正厅后排的观众

detailed_translations.english: to put small marks or holes in the surface of something

sentences.chinese: 她把那页纸揉成团，扔进了火里。
